name: BikerOrNot - New Clean Layout
description:
For the New BON released 9-20-2011 - here is a theme for free!
They really make it tough with all the ads to slow the site down.
But not for my BON Friends..
additional_info:
v 1.0 Initial release - Clean UP No Ads
v.1.2 Cleanup for the new ugliness applied to the site 1-6-2015
v.1.2a a few tweaks to remove those admin ads in the thread.
v.1.2b  Update to Remove the new Trending links section...
